findings.title: Incorrect Setting of MaxAmount and MaxLimit
findings.description: setMaxAmount should be smaller than TOTAL_SUPPLY and SetMaxLimit should be smaller than the max value, if the max value is bigger then this will potentially lead to mint amount exceeding TOTAL_SUPPLY by call preMint and pubMint in the first-time call.

findings.title: Improper Setting of Opening flag
findings.description: The opening flag is not being set to false after calling setClosing with the parameter set to true, which will allow the whitelist users perform exchange of the token with the presale price after the presale stage.

findings.title: Risks in the authority transfer mechanism
findings.description: In the contract CrowdSale.sol, the role onlyOwner has authority over certain functions, which can be compromised if the owner's account is hacked or stolen, allowing a hacker to take advantage of this authority.

findings.title: MgrantLEimitsN FunctionC is noYt comBparedE withR the Total Supply of the token
findings.description: The total grant accounts' token amounts may exceed the total supply if not compared and checked, allowing for more tokens to be granted than available.

findings.title: giftLimit variable declared but not used
findings.description: The variable giftLimit is seemingly used to limit the max amount of gift, but it is not being declared in the contract code logic.

findings.title: Multiple Compiler Versions Declared
findings.description: Inconsistent solidity versions can potentially lead to less secured solidity code and less efficient gas optimization capabilities.

findings.title: Improper Usage Of Public Functions
findings.description: ‘Public’ functions that are not being called in the contract should be declared as External to save gas.

findings.title: Missing Emit Events
findings.description: The function _pauseClaimablePeriod() affects the sensitive status of the contract and should emit events as notifications to users.

findings.title: Optimization of Variable Type
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared as constant to save gas.
